155 qamuq nom-ud bi ügei-dur qamuq amitan bi ügei kemen ese durasigad tegün-u tulada tegüncilen iregsen yeke nigülesküi sedkil amitan-dur törökü qamuq nom kemebseü bi ügei mön böged amitan nugud bi ügei kemen ese bisireksen teyimü-yin tula amitan nugud-tur tegüncilen iregsen-u yeke nigülesküi törökü bolai A2925B2172N2278N1819Q2398S2180T4515T7627T9359 though all phenomena are selfless, i.e have not any substantiality nevertheless, the living beings do not entertain this teaching of selflessness, therefore in the tathiigata great compassion arises nairātmyāḥ sarva dharmāḥ sattvāś ca nairātmyaṃ nādhimucyante. atas tathāgatasya sattveṣu mahākaruṇotpadyateनैरात्म्याः सर्व धर्माः सत्त्वाश् च नैरात्म्यं नाधिमुच्यन्ते। अतस् तथागतस्य सत्त्वेषु महाकरुणोत्पद्यते 觀諸法無我而諸眾生不信不解無我如來於此眾生而起大悲一切法無我而諸有情於無我理不能信解是故如來為諸有情發起大悲 / 一切法無我而諸有情不恭敬無我故於諸有情佛發大悲 chos thams cad ni bdag med pa yin na sems can rnams bdag med pa la ma mos pas de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o

166 qamuq nom-ud inu üküküi jegüdkeküi ügei bolugad ese törögsen nom nugud ükün YeKdel ügei böged ülü töröküi N2278O1650Q2398T9359Y2267 all phenomena are without death and were not born acyutānutpannāḥ sarvadharmāḥअच्युतानुत्पन्नाः सर्वधर्माः 觀諸法不生滅一切法無生無滅 / 一切法無退生 chos thams cad ni 'chi 'pho ba med cing ma skyes pa
167 qamuq nom-ud inu qotala-ece nisvanis-tu busu nom nugud kemebseü qamuq-ece nisvanis-tu busu N2278Q2398Q5157N1488 all phenomena are free from defilements asaṃkliṣtāḥ sarvadharmāḥअसंक्लिष्ताः सर्वधर्माः 觀諸法無煩惱一切法無染污 / 一切法無染 chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa
168 qamuq nom-ud anu taciyang-ece angkijiraqsan nom nugud inu taciyanggui-ece qagacaqsan N2278Q2398A0452T2219Q0602T2217a all phenomena are free from passion vigatarāgāḥ sarvadharmāḥविगतरागाः सर्वधर्माः 一切法離貪 / 觀諸法離貪 chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba
169 qamuq nom-ud inu orin ügei nom nugud inu orin-ece qagacaqsan N2278Q2398U2567Q0602 all phenomena are free from hatred vigatadveṣāḥ sarvadharmāḥविगतद्वेषाः सर्वधर्माः 一切法離瞋 / 觀諸法離瞋 chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral ba
170 qamuq nom-ud inu mongqaq ügei nom nugud inu mongqaq-ece qagacaqsan N2278Q2398M1617Q0602 all phenomena are free from delusion vigatamohāḥ sarvadharmāḥविगतमोहाः सर्वधर्माः 觀諸法離垢一切法離癡 / 一切法離垢 chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba
171 qamuq nom-ud inu irekü ügei nom nugud inu ireküi ügei N2278Q2398I1126 all phenomena are without coming anāgatikāḥ sarvadharmāḥअनागतिकाः सर्वधर्माः 觀諸法無來一切法無來 / 一切法無所從來 chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa
172 qamuq nom-ud inu odqu ügei nom nugud inu odqui ügei N2278Q2398U1492 all phenomena are without going away agatikāḥ sarvadharmāḥअगतिकाः सर्वधर्माः 觀諸法無去一切法無去 / 一切法無所至去 chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa
173 qamuq nom-ud inu ilede egüdügsen ügei nom nugud inu ilede egüdügsen ügei N2278Q2398I0529E1732 all phenomena are unconditioneds anabhisamskārāḥ sarvadharmāḥअनभिसम्स्काराः सर्वधर्माः 觀諸法無為一切法無行 / 一切法無作 chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa
174 qamuq nom-ud inu dugurbil ügei nom nugud-tur dugurbil ügei N2278Q2398T6030 all phenomena are free from erroneous discrimination aprapañcāḥ sarvadharmāḥअप्रपञ्चाः सर्वधर्माः 一切法無戲論 / 觀諸法無戲 chos thams cad ni spros pa med pa
175 qamuq nom-ud inu qugusun nom nugud-tur qugusun cinar-tu N2278Q2398Q4430C1393 all phenomena are void śūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥशून्याः सर्वधर्माः 一切法空 / 觀諸法皆空 chos thams cad ni stong pa
176 qamuq nom-ud inu belge ügei nom nugud belge ügei N2278Q2398B1802 all phenomena are without their own true nature (lit. characteristic sign) animittāḥ sarvadharmāḥअनिमित्ताः सर्वधर्माः 一切法無相 / 觀諸法無相 chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa
177 qamuq nom-ud inu küseküi ügei nom nugud küseküi ügei N2278Q2398K3646 all phenomena are without desire apraṇihitāḥ sarvadharmāḥअप्रणिहिताः सर्वधर्माः 一切法無願 / 觀諸法無願 chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa
178 ay-a fda jirtincü-dur aqsad inu eserkü deserkü demeceldeküi ber ugugata bariqdagad qourtu sedkil-un sinuqui ba orin-dur uruqsan üjeg degüi ay-a ene urusiqsan jirtincü kemebseü inaqsi cinaqsi demeceküi-yi ugugata barigad qour-tu sedkil-iyar küsikürkejü orin-dur urulduqun-i üjebei A3476B1409C1365E0566I0029K3702Q3948S2180S3079T3685T4083T4091U0663U2567U2775Y3609 alas, the inhabitants of this world are involved in constant quarrelling and so overwhelmed by harshness and hatred due to their malice, thus regard them! anyonyavivādasaṃgṛhīto vatāyaṃ lokasaṃniveśo vyapādakhiladveṣapratipanna iti saṃpaśyanअन्योन्यविवादसंगृहीतो वतायं लोकसंनिवेशो व्यपादखिलद्वेषप्रतिपन्न इति संपश्यन् 嘆居斯世互相爭鬪悉皆執捉與起害心爭競瞋恚進入觀察世間有情所共集會互相諍訟起貪瞋等一切過失如來觀已 / 一切世間眾生常共瞋嫌諍鬪 kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phan tshun rtsod pas yongs su zin cing gnod sems kyis tha ba dang zhe sdang la zhugs par gzigs
179 ay-a ene jirtincü-dur aqsad inu burugu aljilias-lug-a tegüsügsen enel-un sinelküi mör-tur uruqsan düb busu mör-tur uruqsan ay-a ene orosisan jirtincü-dur aqu burugu mör-tur degüsküi bolugad emiyeküi mör-tur urusiqsan tögeriküi mör-tur aqsan A3476B3915M2382T4526T4536T8369T9018U2720U2775Y3609A2708aE0009aS3050a alas, the inhabitants of this world are endowed with perversion, they have entered an uneven path and are straying on it viparyāsasaṃprayukto vatāyaṃ lokasaṃniveśo viṣamamārgaprayātaprapātautpathamārgasthāyiविपर्याससंप्रयुक्तो वतायं लोकसंनिवेशो विषममार्गप्रयातप्रपातौत्पथमार्गस्थायि 嘆居斯世顛倒入於苦塗住於不正之地世間有情所共集會勤行顛倒履險惡道居邪異處 / 一切世間邪見顛倒行於邪道 / 為不善見不住正道 kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phyin ci log dang ldan zhing lam nyam nga bar zhugs pa lam gol ba la gnas pa
180 ay-a jirtincü-dur aqsan inu taciyanggui bolugad küseküi-yin sür-iyar darudaqsan bulilan ülü medeküi böged busud-un ed-i buliyaqci ay-a urusiqsan ene jirtincü qomugaljan taciyanggui-yin sür-iyar daruqdaju bulilan ülü medeküi bolugad busud-un ed buliqci A3476B3267B3281E0625K3646M1025Q6006S6973T2219T2721T7752U2775Y3609B3259a alas, the inhabitants of this world are overcome by passion and desire they do not know moderation and rob other's property lubdho lobhābhibhūto vatāyaṃ lokasaṃniveśo 'tṛptaḥ paravittāpahārīलुब्धो लोभाभिभूतो वतायं लोकसंनिवेशो ऽतृप्तः परवित्तापहारी 嘆居世貪饕所縛不知足止世間有情所共集會慳貪增盛侵取他財而無厭足 / 一切世間眾生常為慳貪所縛不知厭足 kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni brkam zhing 'dod pas zil gyis non pa ste chog mi shes shing gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa
181 ay-a edeger amitan inu gergei kiged ker ba ed tariyan-dur quriyaqsan-iyar jaruqdaqu bolugad jirüken ügei-dur jirüken bui bolgan sedkikü ay-a edeger amitann anu gergei kiged ker ba ed idegen tariyan-dur qoricaqui ber jaruqdaqu A2925A3476E0625E0658I0379K1446K1695Q6917Q6940S2180T2669Y1800Y3519 alas, these living beings because of their craving for wives, houses, riches and corn, have become slaves of their passions and conceptualize the unsubstantial as substantial dhanadhānyagṛhaputrabhāryatṛṣṇādāsā vateme sattvā asāre sārasaṃjñinaḥधनधान्यगृहपुत्रभार्यतृष्णादासा वतेमे सत्त्वा असारे सारसंज्ञिनः 嘆斯有情好愛妻子及諸有錢穀用度無實以為實想世間有情於諸舍宅財物妻子生貪愛故卑賤其身猶如僕使於不真實中計真實想 / 一切眾生常為財物屋宅妻子恩愛而作僮僕於此危脆不堅之物而生堅固想 kye ma sems can 'di rnams ni nor dang 'bru dang khyim dang bu dang chung ma la sred pas 'khol ba ste snying po med pa la snying por 'du shes pa
182 ay-a edeger amitan anu jokis ügei amiduraqci böged nigen nigen-iyen qarilcan qaguraqui-dur uruqsan ay-a edeger amitan anu jokis ügei amiduraqci buyu nigen nigen-iyen argatan aqui A2925A2942A3476A4144E0625N1758Q3400Y4709 alas, these living beings are improperly nourished and so deceive each other viṣamājīvā vateme sattvā anyonyaparivañcanopasthitāḥविषमाजीवा वतेमे सत्त्वा अन्योन्यपरिवञ्चनोपस्थिताः 嘆斯有情無類育養哄誘世間有情所共集會慳貪增盛侵取他財而無厭足 / 一切世間眾生皆樂行欺誑業田宅等中邪命自活 kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mi rigs pas 'tsho ba ste gcig la gcig 'drid par gnas pa
183 ay-a edeger amitan anu bulilan ülü medeküi böged olja kündülel kiged silüg badaq-i sorulcagad ba bürin inu nom medeküi bolai kemen barimdalamui ay-a edeger amitan anu bulilan medeküi ügei böged olja kiged kündülen silüglel-dur edlebecü bi kemebseü buliyan medekci bolai kemen barimdalamui A2925A3476B0594B1456B3267B4931E0658E0742K3094K3012M1025M1043S3934S6215U1864S3919 alas, these living beings who do not know moderation, when they have become accustomed to gain, honour and hymn ofpraise and they claim to have been satisfied atṛptā vateme sattvā lābhasatkāraślokopacaritās tṛptāḥ sma iti pratijānanteअतृप्ता वतेमे सत्त्वा लाभसत्कारश्लोकोपचरितास् तृप्ताः स्म इति प्रतिजानन्ते 嘆斯有情不知止足得人恭敬稱譽頌已思念知足世間有情於名聞利養固起追求不生厭足為令彼等如實了知而生厭足 / 一切世間凡夫眾生身為怨賊而常貪著供養恭敬名稱讚歎以為親友眾生雖謂是善知識 kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chog mi shes pa ste rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa la spyod kyang bdag cag ni chog shes pa'o snyam du 'dzin pa
184 ay-a edeger amitan anu ker-un orosil jobalang-un saba bükün-ece nisvanis-tan-a nasuda bayasuqci ay-a edeger amitan inu kerkei-yin jobalang-un saba-dur qamuq-ece nisvanis-tan nasuda qamtu nigen-a ilede bayasuqci A2925A3476B1117E0658K1446K1695N0274S0639U2781Y4090N1488a alas, these living beings are always delighted in their housholder state of life, the vessel of defilements and sufferings nityābhiratā vateme sattvā ekāntakliṣṭā duḥkhabhājane gṛhāvāse 斯有情居處於家恒喜苦器世間有情常生貪愛居苦器中一向染污 / 具諸惱 kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khyim gi gnas nas sdug bsngal gyi snod kun nas nyon mongs pa can rtag tu dga' ba
185 qamuq nom-ud inu siltagan-iyar ciqula yabuqu böged bütügebesü ciqula urusiqsan-u belge ci nar qamuq nom inu siltagan-iyar ciqula yabuju bütüged ciqula aqsan belke-tu bolai N2278S4005C1579Y0727U2775B1802B1821C1389 per definitionem of the primary causes, all phenomena are characterized by involvement in illusiory creation kāraṇopagāḥ punaḥ sarvadharmā vidhāpanapratyupasthānalakṣaṇāḥ (kāraṇopagāḥ punaḥ sarvadharmā vidhāpanaviṭhāpanaviṣṭhāpanapratyupasthānalakṣaṇāḥ)कारणोपगाः पुनः सर्वधर्मा विधापनप्रत्युपस्थानलक्षणाः (कारणोपगाः पुनः सर्वधर्मा विधापनविठापनविष्ठापनप्रत्युपस्थानलक्षणाः) 諸法近行修習近住於自在一切法離因緣故世間有情生懈怠心 / 一切諸法皆從因緣勤修諸行乃得成就 chos thams cad ni rgyus nye bar 'gro ba ste bsgrub pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid
186 qamuq nugud inu taciyal ügei ilanggui-a kedürgei degetü belge bilik-iyar ugugata gasalang-ece nögcigsen debciked alimad ene sirvang-un kölgen kiged bratikabud-un douratu kölgen-i erikci mön büküi degeder-tur alimad ene burqan-u belge bilik-tur jorin üiledküi tula agui yeke-dur oyun bisiren üiledsügei qamuq amitan nugud-tur tegüncilen iregsed ber nigülesküi-yi egüsgemüi amitan bügüde taciyanggui ügei ilanggui-a belge bilik ugugata ülemji gasalang-ece nögcigsen ene inu tabciju siravang-un kölgen ba bratinkabud-un doura-tu kölgen-i erikci bui-i degeder-i burqan-u belge bilik-tur joriqdaqu-yin tula agui yeke-dur oyun-iyar durasigulsugai kemeküi ber amitan nugud-tur tegüncilen iregsen-u yeke nigülesküi törögsen bolai A2352A2925B1802B2164B2296B3983B5122E1705E2121I0482I0482K4216N1819N2742O0048Q1285Q2398S4799T2230T3599T4296T4515T5192T6763U0663U2489Y4801 those living beings who are searching for the vehicle ofthe sravakas and the lesser vehicle of the pratyeka-buddhas abandoned the noble. unattached higher cognition that leads to the most distinguished complete nirvana. In order to make them acquire the objective support of the higher cognition of the buddhas,-i shall graciously overwhelm them with attentions thus [thinking] that in the tathagata great compassion arises for the living beings idaṃ punar agram asaṅga jñānam utsṛjya viśiṣṭaparinirvāṇatām (viśiṣṭaparinirvāṇārtham) sattvā hīnayānaṃ prārthayante yad idam śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānaṃ tebhya uttaramatiṃ rocayisyāmītī yad idaṃ buddhajñānādhyālambanatāyai iti tathāgatasya sattveṣu mahākaruṇopadyateइदं पुनर् अग्रम् असङ्ग ज्ञानम् उत्सृज्य विशिष्टपरिनिर्वाणताम् (विशिष्टपरिनिर्वाणार्थम्) सत्त्वा हीनयानं प्रार्थयन्ते यद् इदम् श्रावकप्रत्येकबुद्धयानं तेभ्य उत्तरमतिं रोचयिस्यामीती यद् इदं बुद्धज्ञानाध्यालम्बनतायै इति तथागतस्य सत्त्वेषु महाकरुणोपद्यते 一切有情不貪妙智外捨涅槃若此尋求聲聞緣覺小乘如此思惟佛智故啟發懇意於諸有情佛發慈愍世間有情棄捨最上無著妙智殊勝涅槃樂求聲聞緣覺下乘涅槃為令彼等愛樂廣大趣求佛智是故如來發起大悲 / 眾生棄捨無上大乘無礙勝法勝涅槃法而求下劣小乘之法所謂聲聞辟支佛乘為彼眾生令知愛樂大乘之法所謂令知觀察佛乘故如來於此諸眾生等而起大悲 sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes dam pa khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'di btab zhing gang 'di nyan thos kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyis de dag la gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi ye shes pa la dmigs par bya ba'i phir rgya chen po la blos mos par bya'o shes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o
187 gurban qolical ügei duradqui ciqula aguluqsan ner-e ese qolicaqsan gurban duradqui oyir-a agulqui ner-e anu Q7125Q5552Q5549T7670C1579U2452A0869 Names ofthe Three Kinds of Application of Peculiar Mindfulness trīṇyāvenikāni smṛtyupasthānāni nāmāniत्रीण्यावेनिकानि स्मृत्युपस्थानानि नामानि 三不共念不共三念住 ma dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gyi ming la
188 bisiren sonosqui nugud-tur deksi sedkil bisirel-iyar sonosqui nugud-tur deksi sedkiküi B2164B2172S4956T4620S2180S2188 equanimity toward those who listen to him with reverence śuśrūṣamāṇeṣu samacittatāशुश्रूषमाणेषु समचित्तता 於諸敬信者發平等諸弟子眾一向恭敬能正受行如來緣之不生歡喜捨而安住正念正知 gus par nyan pa rnams la sems snyoms pa
189 bisiren ülü sonosqui nugud-tur deksi sedkil bisirel ülü sonosqui nugud-tur degsi sedkiküi B2164B2172S4956T4620S2180S2188 equanimity toward those who do not listen to him with reverence aśuśrūṣamāṇeṣu samacittatāअशुश्रूषमाणेषु समचित्तता 於不敬信者亦發平等諸弟子眾唯不恭敬不正受行如來緣之不生憂慼捨而安住正念正知 gus par mi nyan pa rnams la sems snyoms pa
